name: Encrypt your Phone
description: Encrypt your phone. Both Android and iOS have this feature built in, and it can be enabled it from the settings menu

name: Secure PIN
description: Have a passphrase or PIN over 6 digits to access your phone

name: App Permissions
description: Don’t grant apps permissions that they don’t need

name: Connectivity Features
description: Turn of connectivity features that aren't currently being used

name: Find my Phone
description: Enable find my phone, for iPhone or Android. If it gets stolen, you can remotely erase the data
